BITD.edge_fearsome_description: The cohort is terrifying in aspect and reputation.
BITD.edge_independent_description: The cohort can be trusted to make good decisions and act on their own initiative in the absence of direct orders.
BITD.edge_loyal_description: The cohort can’t be bribed or turned against you.
BITD.edge_tenacious_description: The cohort won’t be deterred from a task.
